title: We need a furry midlaner, Bot lane ADC, and support
body:
That way we can have a whole team of furries. 

All chat: Fucking furries man...

replies.body:
I could get behind this.

No not like that.
Yes like that
Why not like that?
Because some people have their minds constantly in the gutter.
But...Anivia Isn't anthropomorphic.

> [{quoted}](name=Ralanr,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=0HrYIW8N,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2017-01-11T20:50:21.256+0000)
>
> But...Anivia Isn't anthropomorphic.

Fine.
{{champion:268}}
Does that still count as a furry if he's feathery?
Yes, anthro lizards, birds etc are also considered as furries
That's better.
Ur dumb.. best choice is obvious.. {{champion:103}}

> [{quoted}](name=DefineHellForMeh,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=0HrYIW8N,comment-id=0006000000000003,timestamp=2017-01-12T14:45:19.504+0000)
>
> Ur dumb.. best choice is obvious.. {{champion:103}}

Sorry, not a weeb fangasming boy into foxgirl boobs.
Sorry i'm not as toxic (as you) :p {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
has a furry team {{champion:103}} somehow isn't included

Because she's not a furry. She's a halfbreed. 

It's like those human cat girls.
She is close enough to count
Nah man, you want Ahri fanboys to be called furries?  They are weebs.  Proud Weebs!
FURRY WEEB DETECTED!! ABORT! ABORT!

http://i.imgur.com/Uo94mD2.jpg?noredirect

Not a furry.
She has some identifiable fox characteristics, so she is at least semi furry.
stop normalizing furries
I mean technically he is asking Rito to normalize furries....

I don't see it as 'normalizing' at all.
We know we're weird, it's not normal, but we're not gut sucking monsters that crawl out from under your bed to eat your women and children either.

Well, not all of us.
Don't tell me I'm the only one that does that...
You'll never be alone my friend
No.
How could you people forget {{champion:12}}?

Because you can't milk those.

Send help.

> [{quoted}](name=Elise Isnt Meta,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=0HrYIW8N,comment-id=00040001,timestamp=2017-01-11T20:22:02.999+0000)
>
> Because you can't milk those.
> 
> Send help.

Those you can't milk, *that* you can.
Well derp.
I keep screaming but God won't answer
**SCREAM HARDER**

I am being a bit of a hypocrite because I've written Ezreal / Human!Sol fanfiction so...

But I'm still screaming.
wait what how?
I'll never tell
*heavy breathing* LINK LINK LINK LINK LINK LINK
Yes, I need that link. I can't rest until I've read it.
*WHISPERS* post it..... for the greater good
ADC is {{champion:29}}
Yourdles are not furries!

Do scalies count? 

{{champion:58}}  {{champion:136}} (?)
Yes!  If Azir counts then scalies count!

Why not a team of scalies then? We already have so many furry characters, I feel we need more of the scaled variety. 

Top: {{champion:58}} 
Mid: {{champion:136}} 
Jg:? {{champion:102}} Don't even know if she counts because of the half human thing. 
Adc:
Sup:

See!?
Shyvana doesn't count.
No yordle challenge. No furry-like people like Ahri either.
But Yordles are a furry's dream!
Yordles are too easy. Don't play easy mode.
